name: Mindom
description:
Control yellow cube to make blue cube escape from the board space to solve challenging escape puzzles. Find the best path and use less steps to escape, they're not as easy as they look. Care to give one a try?

◆ 4 diffrent mode make the escape puzzle more challenger and fun.
◆ Over 400 of brain busting escape puzzles, with more being added all the time
◆ Compete with your friends for the Mindom! crown
◆ Multiple ways to solve each puzzle, can you find the best solution to get 3 stars?

4 ADDICTIVE MODES:
◇ CLASSIC : Original control, 120 classic levels, get pleasure after solving the puzzle in every level .
◇ SOKOBAN: Mixed the gameplay of sokoban, relive the classics.
◇ MIRROR: Reverse the path, burn your brain
◇ GALAXY: Instant crossing, more dreamy gameplay

FREE DOWNLOAD NOW!

If you like this game, please rate it and leave a comment. As an indie developer your support is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your help! If you don't like something in the game, please email me at contact@hapmonkey.com and tell me why. I want to hear your feedback and comments so I can continue to make this game better.

I hope you enjoy Mindom!
